item.title: ESP-IDF tutorial series: Logging
item.description: This article shows how ESP-IDF’s logging system uses tags and verbosity levels to produce structured, configurable output, helping you keep code clean and debug more effectively.

item.title: ESP-IDF tutorial series: Errors
item.description: This article explains error handling in FreeRTOS-based embedded systems, highlighting common C practices and their limitations. It introduces ESP-IDF’s esp_err_t type and error-checking macros, demonstrating how they help manage errors systematically. It shows practical ways to implement error handling in embedded applications.
